title: Jeftar Mascarenhas
description: Kick off your next, great Gatsby project with this default-starter-intl. This barebones starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need.
workerDescription: I always look for projects relevant to web or mobile. I love what I do. Make the most of technology best practices.
lifeDescription: When I’m not coding, I’m busy studying investment in scholarship, politics, music, and running.
author: @jeftar

notfound.description: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
